Interrupts.Name: Spirit Trickery
Interrupts.Trigger: The hob is damaged by an ability, and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: Teleport all adjacent characters 1, then teleport 1.

Actions.Name: Spirit Orb
Actions.Charge: Teleport affected foes 1 space in any direction.

Actions.Name: Whisk
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 6 becomes vulnerable, then is teleported 1. Vulnerable foes are teleported 3 instead.

Actions.Name: Playful Pricking
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 of the spirit is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, each time they teleport, they take 1 piercing damage. This damage cannot reduce them past 1 hp. A character can end this mark by not moving for their entire turn.

Actions.Name: Fell Spirit
Actions.Description: The spirit hob ends its turn and summons a spirit orb in range 6, an immobile, intangible summon.
Actions.Delay: The hob's next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, the orb explodes, destroying it and releasing a massive blast of sonic energy in a blast 1 area effect centered on it. Foes inside are shattered, then must save or take [D]+[fray] twice, or once on a successful save.

Interrupts.Name: Spirit Trickery
Interrupts.Trigger: The hob is damaged by an ability, and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: Teleport all adjacent characters 2, then teleport 2.
